QUICK SUMMARY:  Works well to charge my iPhone, reasonable price, but some design choices keep me from liking this one.WHAT I LIKE:- Fairly small, this would work well to give a device a needed boost of power- Fairly Inexpensive; if you lost it, you wouldn't be too upset- Battery capacity is enough to give my not-fully-discharged iPhone a couple of boosts before this pack needs recharging- The input port for recharging uses a micro USB cord (not included, but you've probably got many of these already)- Charging time (for my iPhone) was quickWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- The hard plastic shell won't absorb any impact well without cracking, breaking.  It would be much better to construct this out of a rubberized material that absorbs shock.  See the included keychain in the picture?  Have you ever dropped your keys onto a hard floor?- There is no battery level indicator.  It's just blue = ready, power available, and flashing blue means it's time to recharge the pack.  When charging it, flashing red = recharging, solid red = fully charged.  I much prefer knowing how much capacity is left in a battery pack with at least 25% intervals.- Would be nice if it had rubber plugs for the USB ports so the whole thing would be water resistant.- Relative to competitor products, this item is still priced a little higher than other options with no discernible benefit for the extra costCONCLUSION:  Amazon carries a LOT of 2600mAh battery packs.  I couldn't find a reason why you'd choose this item over any other, better reviewed battery packs.  (Vendor supplied free item for unbiased product review).

QUICK SUMMARY: These lights work as designed, cast off enough light to see something (barely), and are dirt cheap.BACKGROUND: I installed these lights on the walkway leading up to my front door, which gets ambient light from a street lamp and front door overhead light.  I also tested these in the absolute darkness of my garage, to see how much light they cast off in pitch darkness (answer:  enough to see a footpath and things on that footpath, but only within a 2' in diameter).WHAT I LIKE:- Easy to assemble. Just insert the plastic stake into one end of the stainless steel tube, and insert the light fixture into the opposite end of the tube. To turn on the automatic light mechanism, twist off the top of the light fixture, flip the switch to the ON position, then re-twist the fixture on again.- Each fixture came with a rechargeable battery pre-installed- The batteries are Ni-MH, not Ni-Cad, so they shouldn't be subject to a battery "memory effect" that degrades performance- I only cared that these lights would work from dusk until midnight, and they do that- They are maintenance free- They are so cheap, if one breaks or otherwise needs replacing, it's not costly to do soWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- The stainless steel tube is paper thin and easily bent. I wish the product used marine-quality stainless steel that was thicker, sturdier, since these are going to be subject to the elements. As-is, I have my doubts that the "Made in China" stainless steel will stand-up to Florida's heat, humidity, and rain. (I also wonder how the batteries are going to hold up in Florida's summertime heat, too).- I wish the white light was brighter than it is, even if that meant glowing for a shorter duration.WHAT I DID NOT LIKE:- Replacing the battery involves unscrewing 2 small screws, but the screw heads are so poorly formed, it can be challenging or impossible to unscrew them.- The packaging wrongly says that these lights use a 300mAh, AA-sized battery.  They don't.  They use a 600mAh, AAA-sized battery.CONCLUSION: These are "Made in China" and you get what you pay for.  If you need dim lights for a sidewalk or step, easy installation, no wiring, and don't expect these to withstand the elements for many years, you'll probably like these solar lights. (Vendor supplied free item for unbiased product review).

QUICK SUMMARY: These lights work as designed, cast off enough light to see something (barely), and are dirt cheap.UPDATED 6/15/2015:  ** DO NOT BUY **.  After six months, most of these light fixtures stopped working.  All of them showed a LOT of rust spots (the "stainless steel" is of such poor quality that they began showing small rust spots after just 30 days), marring the appearance of the one light that is still working. I also tested these in the absolute darkness of my garage, to see how much light they cast off in pitch darkness (answer:  enough to see a footpath and things on that footpath, but only within a 2' in diameter).WHAT I LIKE:- Easy to assemble. Just insert the plastic stake into one end of the stainless steel tube, and insert the light fixture into the opposite end of the tube. To turn on the automatic light mechanism, twist off the top of the light fixture, flip the switch to the ON position, then re-twist the fixture on again.- Each fixture came with a rechargeable battery pre-installed- The batteries are Ni-MH, not Ni-Cad, so they shouldn't be subject to a battery "memory effect" that degrades performance- I only cared that these lights would work from dusk until midnight, and they do that- They are maintenance free- They are so cheap, if one breaks or otherwise needs replacing, it's not costly to do soWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- The stainless steel tube is paper thin and easily bent. I wish the product used marine-quality stainless steel that was thicker, sturdier, since these are going to be subject to the elements. As-is, I have my doubts that the "Made in China" stainless steel will stand-up to Florida's heat, humidity, and rain. (I also wonder how the batteries are going to hold up in Florida's summertime heat, too).- I wish the white light was brighter than it is, even if that meant glowing for a shorter duration.WHAT I DID NOT LIKE:- Replacing the battery involves unscrewing 2 small screws, but the screw heads are so poorly formed, it can be challenging or impossible to unscrew them.- The packaging wrongly says that these lights use a 300mAh, AA-sized battery.  They don't.  They use a 600mAh, AAA-sized battery.CONCLUSION: These are "Made in China" and you get what you pay for.  If you need dim lights for a sidewalk or step, easy installation, no wiring, and don't expect these to withstand the elements for many years, you'll probably like these solar lights. (Vendor supplied free item for unbiased product review).

QUICK SUMMARY:  These lights work as designed, but the color change effect was too abrupt for my liking.UPDATED 6/15/2015:  ** DO NOT BUY **.  After six months, most of these light fixtures stopped working.  All of them showed a LOT of rust spots (the "stainless steel" is of such poor quality that they began showing small rust spots after just 30 days), marring the appearance of the one light that is still working.  Terrible quality, a great disappointment.  Try another a product - avoid these completely!BACKGROUND:  I installed these lights around the footpath around my backyard pool, where they get a lot of sunlight during the day.WHAT I LIKE:- Easy to assemble.  Just insert the plastic stake into one end of the stainless steel tube, and insert the light fixture into the opposite end of the tube.  To turn on the automatic light mechanism, twist off the top of the light fixture, flip the switch to the ON position, then re-twist the fixture on again.- Each fixture came with a rechargeable battery pre-installed- The batteries are Ni-MH, not Ni-Cad, so they shouldn't be subject to a battery "memory effect" that degrades performance- The batteries are user-replaceable- I only cared that these lights would work from dusk until midnight, and they do that- They are maintenance freeWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- The light color-shifting is too abrupt, occurring in 1-2 seconds.  I wish the color shifting was more nuanced, even imperceptible.  Instead, the too-quick color shifting draws attention to the light fixture.  I want these landscape lights to be more subtle than what they are.- The stainless steel tube is paper thin and easily bent.  I wish the product used marine-quality stainless steel that was thicker, sturdier, since these are going to be subject to the elements.  As-is, I have my doubts that the "Made in China" stainless steel will stand-up to Florida's heat, humidity, and rain.  (I also wonder how the batteries are going to hold up in Florida's summertime heat, too).- The red color is so dark, that it fails to illuminate my footpath.  Only the greenish-blue color does a reasonable job of illuminating my footpath.- I wish there was a way to not allow the colors to change; instead, I wish I could just choose a color to always have lit up.NOTE:  The package boasts "Color Changing LED Lights" which is true. But it also says, in smaller letters, "The lights...have super bright white LED lights" which is not true.  They don't cast off white light, much less "super bright" white light.CONCLUSION:  If the light changing colors were much more subtle, and if you could choose to display just one color (turning off the color changing feature), this would be a 4-star item.  I do worry that a landscape light set that is "Made in China" won't hold up to Florida's climate very well. (Vendor supplied free item for unbiased product review).

QUICK SUMMARY:  Fun for kids, this is a good novelty gift to give to an older child (say, 6+) or very early teenager.  Don't expect it to sound better than a transistor radio's speaker, though (but they will sound better than an iPhone's internal speaker).  For me, this is a 3-star item, but my younger kids like it so much, I've bumped it up to 4-stars since they are really the intended audience here.BACKGROUND:  I chose to review this item just because I thought some of my kids would enjoy testing it with me.  I was right.  It was my college-aged son who first got the speakers out of the box, but it was my younger kids who most enjoyed the light effects these speakers gave off.  The speakers are USB powered, so we used a battery pack we use with our iPods and iPhones to supply the power.  Then, we connected the audio to my iPhone.  The speaker dancing light display starts when my iPhone's volume slider is moved half-way to the right.  At two-thirds volume, you get quite a nice, splashing light display.  At full volume, you get bursts of lit water and very distorted speaker sound.  As far as sound goes, these speakers are equivalent to a battery-operated, transistor radio.  They have no bass and they amplify sound without making it sound good.  But young kids don't really care about that (mine didn't, anyway).  They just enjoyed the novelty of this item, and when I suggested boxing these up and donating them after I finished writing this review, they objected.  That says something about the appeal this item has for young kids.WHAT WE NOTICED:- The light display corresponds to the volume of the speakers, but not necessarily to the beat of the music- There are four LED colors in each speaker:  orange/yellow, green, blue, red- One speaker slightly emphasized blue, one emphasized green- The color display cast onto our ceiling above the speakers was blue/green (almost no red and no yellow)WHAT WE LIKE:- The whole splashing, colorful light thing is admittedly cool, especially in a darkened room- This would be a cool effect for a kids' room or if you're having a party and need background music (but not great-sounding music)- We liked the light display cast onto our ceiling as well as the splashy water display- My young kids thought these speakers sounded okay (for the money, they do sound okay)- The audio cable fits my iPhone without me having to remove the iPhone's protective case- The portable design (when used with a USB battery pack) makes these very versatile as to where you can use themWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- Would be really nice to turn-off the speakers and just connect these to an audio system where the music is played with high-fidelity speakers while these do just the whole dancing water show thing- Would be nice to have a sensitivity adjustment so the dancing water display is user-adjusted irrespective of the volume level- Would be nice if the red and yellow-orange lights were not overpowered by the green-blue LED lights (noticeable on the ceiling)CONCLUSION:  This is a great novelty gift for someone who is entranced with colorful lights and sound, and isn't discriminating when it comes to audio fidelity.  (Vendor supplied free item for unbiased product review).

QUICK SUMMARY:  Utilitarian basket installs in a minute (if you know how it's done - mine had no installation instructions) and works as intended.  It's a little hard to adjust the adjustable piece that rotates around the bike's steerer tube.BACKGROUND:  I installed this onto my Raleigh hybrid bike, which is painted black.  The white of this basket contrasts nicely with the black, but I'd rather have had a matching black basket than a contrasting white color.  The box containing this bike basket had no instructions, and I'm admittedly dull when it comes to figuring out stuff like this.  If you look at the picture, though, you'll see that the plastic-coated (black) ends of the basket handle face forward on the bike.  The basket bottom has two holes into which two hooks from the basket's support rack fit.  The black, cushioned hooks of the rack fit over your handlebars (meaning if you have any lights or bells on the handlebars right next to the stem, you'll need to relocate them).INSTALLATION:  Start by putting the basket rack onto your bike.  That part is easy.  The big, cushioned hooks go onto the center of your handlebar.  Then, attach the rack's black strap around your bike's steerer tube (once you wrap it around the bike's steerer tube, you thread the strap through a buckle on the strap, draw it tight, and use the strap's Velcro to make it a snug fit.  Now, the bike rack should be fitted on top of your handlebar and against your bike's steerer tube.  To attach the basket to the rack, grasp the two basket handles and hold the basket using just those two handles (they'll be vertically positioned this way).  Maneuver the two holes in the basket's bottom onto the rack's two support hooks intended to support the basket.  Then, position the basket snuggly against the basket rack so when you put down the handles, they lock the top of the basket onto the basket rack.  After you do it once, it's easy to do thereafter.WHAT I LIKE:- It's easy to install the basket, once you've done it one time- It's easy to uninstall it, too, and the handle make it a great as grocery basket, too- It's sturdy enough to hold two gallons of milk or a gallon of milk and a bag of groceries- The finer mesh at the bottom of the basket keeps small articles from falling out of the basket- The basket is covered in a plastic coating to keep it weather-resistant- For the money, it's a reasonable valueWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- My basket came with a yellow, permanently discolored corner at one corner of the basket bottom.  I have no idea why.- A simple installation guide showing how to install the thing would've saved me a moment of trouble figuring it out on my own- Would be nice to have an included, waterproof, attachable pouch to fit inside the basket (for keys, iPhone, etc.)CONCLUSION:  Good value overall.  This item solves a problem I've had anytime I go to the grocery store and buy a gallon of milk, and then I have to juggle holding onto it on one side of my bike (disrupting my balance) while riding my bike back home again.

QUICK SUMMARY:  Works well, and works instantly, with acceptable accuracy for most applications.  But some design choices keep this from being a 5-star product.WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW:  The product description doesn't mention its stated accuracy.  It's accurate above freezing +/- 2.7 degrees Fahrenheit, or +/- 1.5 degrees Celsius.  Below freezing and the accuracy declines to +/- 5 degrees Fahrenheit or +/- 3 degrees Celsius.  You can independently turn on/off the backlight and the laser.  At one foot away from an object, the "spot size" (area being scanned) is about 1.5 inches in diameter.  At three feet away, the spot size is 3 inches.  At five feet away, the spot size is about 5.5 inches.  You have to guess at the spot size being scanned based upon how far away you are from the object you're scanning.WHAT I LIKE:- It works well and gave read-outs similar to a digital thermometer I regularly use- Extremely fast read-outs, the initial read-out comes up in less than a second- The red laser is bright and excellent for determining where you're pointing, exactly- The backlight display really helps to make the LCD display easy to see in dim lighting- The unit felt very comfortable to hold, and is very lightWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- There is no way to turn-off the audible feedback beeping noise, which you hear after you release the trigger- The unit auto-shuts off after just 7 seconds after releasing the trigger, which in my opinion is much too quick- The unit lacks a Min/Max function that records the minimum and maximum temperature, so you can see the min/max values after you've finished scanning an object's surface- The very small pictures inside the instruction manual use text labels that are impossibly small to see without eyestrain- The unit is not water resistant.  It would be nice if it were water resistant so if it's used outside at a work site or indoors in the kitchen, it won't get damaged by getting wet.CONCLUSION:  For the asking price, this is a very good, no-frills, infrared thermometer.  If that's what you're looking for, you won't be disappointed with this device.  (Vendor supplied free item for unbiased product review).

QUICK SUMMARY:  The mouse hardware is excellent, but the software is the weak link here.BACKGROUND:  We have a gaming computer hooked up to our TV in our family room. Everyone in my family got a chance to use this mouse, but only my college-aged son attempted to use the software (he's the one who built the gaming computer). Like the Corsair gaming keyboard (another review item), my son found the software for the mouse to be pretty unintuitive and dismal.WHAT WE LIKED:- Feels excellent in the hand, smooth top, with textured thumb-rest, pleasantly wide- Good button placement, easily accessible without much effort- Scroll wheel is precise, feels excellent- Lots of configurable buttons- Nice, braided USB cable- High DPI means more sensitivity, important for gaming- Sniper button is cool, drops DPI, making it easier to pull off precise shots- Wide variety of potential colors- Very customizable if software works rightWHAT WE DID NOT LIKE:- The software!  It is hard to use, and difficult to find what you're looking for- The lights are rather weak, especially when you use it during the daytimeCONCLUSION:  Excellent hardware, lacking software.  Hopefully future updates to the software will make the software more usable and user-friendly.  The Corsair Gaming Mouse alone gets 5 stars, but I have to knock off a star for how bad the software is.

QUICK SUMMARY:  Video gamers in my home like the lights and sound of this high-end gaming keyboard.  But the software keeps this from being a 5-star product.BACKGROUND:  We have a gaming computer hooked up to our TV in our family room.  Everyone in my family got a chance to use this keyboard, but only my college-aged son attempted to use the software (he's the one who built the gaming computer).  He found that updating the firmware of the keyboard only worked on USB 2.0, not USB 3.0 -- not sure why that was, but it's noteworthy if you're going to update the keyboard firmware to the latest version (which we had to do).  He found the software to be pretty dismal, which is saying something because he's working on a degree in the IT industry (if he can't do it easily, heaven help the rest of us!).WHAT WE LIKED:- Smooth key actuation- Pleasant clicking sound (note:  I personally don't care for the clicking sound, but the youth in my home liked the clicking)- Wide variety of colors- Nice-feeling, braded cable, seems durable, good length- Good traction on smooth surfaces, won't slide away as you're typing- Software is powerful, wide variety of features- Near infinite customizability when software works rightWHAT COULD BE BETTER:- Software is buggy, it's hard to find settings you're looking for- Keyboard backlight, even on max setting, seems dim in daylight (but otherwise seems bright)- Firmware hung on usb 3.0, had to connect to usb 2.0 to update successfully- Darker colors aren't richer, they are simply dimmer versions of lighter colorsCONCLUSION:  Excellent hardware, feels solid and well put together.  Software brings it down.  While powerful, it is poorly designed and hard to operate.  Hopefully the software will improve over time.

Sassy red MP3 player!  This is a great little MP3/MP4 player. Of course I loved the price the most, but the quality of this player is nicely designed to be like the expensive version. This VERY affordable MP3/MP4 player is quite stylish. I love that it looks just like the expensive brand name ones at an unbelievable price! You can even use it as a flash drive!  Now the LCD is only 1.78", but for this price you might be tempted to save all that money and just use this great player for it all! 0:18 Mins iRULU Portable Mini Wireless Bluetooth Speaker Built-in Microphone WhiteOK, let me just say that I am someone who likes to listen to music casually. I am not OCD about, too much treble or not enough bass. I am more about how the song and sound make me feel, so my review is based on how I perceive this Bluetooth speaker to be. I have been utilizing it for about 2 weeks now and it is MINE. Wow this was a very gripping movie.  I loved all the twists and turns!  I am a huge fan of Sylvester Stallone and have watched all of his movies.  He never falls to provide a wonderful job with his acting skills.  The story line was so unique and amazingly thought out.  The sets were done in a way that made you wonder... what if... This is a beautiful bracelet!  It has a lovely design:  a square with a gem, a link, a square with a gem, a link etc. This adds up to an elegant looking bracelet. The bracelet I got has a purple gem in it - it is a beautiful color that really stands out. This is the type of bracelet that can be worn both casually (with jeans and a T-shirt) and for dress-up (at the office, theater, dinner etc.) At seven inches, the bracelet is a tad big for my thin wrist, but it doesn't slide around on my arm as much as I thought it would. Finally, I love the way this bracelet is packaged - in a gift box with a polishing cloth - a nice added touch.I received this product in exchange for a review.

The older I get, the more I have aches and pains even though I exercise on a regular basis. I am on the computer all day long at work which means an achy back and shoulders. Because of that, I am willing to try anything that helps work out the kinks, so I was happy to have a chance to use and review this foam roller.I have been very pleased with this foam roller. It is the perfect size - 18" x 6" - which not only makes it easy to store but it fits easily into a gym bag. It is thick and sturdy enough that I feel comfortable using it. There is a learning curve to using it - my first attempts were laughable but once I got the hang of it I found it works very well (YouTube has some great videos that will help you get started). I have been using this on my neck which is stiff from being hunched over a computer screen all day, and my back which is messed up from a fall down the stairs many years ago and I am pleased with the results on both. My neck is much less stiff and my back feels much better.I am very happy with this foam roller.I received this product in exchange for a review.

This Jewelry set contains a necklace, bracelet, and a pair of earrings.  It comes with a small bag to store the set when you are not wearing it.Necklace: when I first opened the package I wasn't sure I liked the necklace.  The design looked a little bit off and the whole necklace looked kind of bland.  But something happened when I put the necklace on - all of a sudden the chain and stone â€œsparkledâ€ and looked outstanding.  The necklace is nicely designed so you can wear it with all kinds of outfits.  This is truly a case where you really have to try it on to appreciate it.Bracelet: this bracelet is gorgeous!  It has a really cute design and the stone in the middle really stands out.  My wrists are small and I was afraid the bracelet wouldn't fit but I was able to use the clasp on an inside link and the bracelet ended up fitting perfectly on my tiny wrist.Earrings: these earrings are also very pretty.  French hook earrings are my favorite because they very easy to put in and take out.  Again, the pink gem in the earrings is what makes these earrings standout.  The earrings are on the big side but not obnoxiously so.  I have short hair and these earrings work very well with my hairstyle.I really love this Jewelry Set.  It is very cute and really dresses up an outfit.  I get more compliments when I wear this set than I do with any other jewelry set I own (several people asked me what the special location was when I first wore them).  I will be wearing this set often.I received this product in exchange for a review.

The Pure Guardian 120 Hour Ultrasonic Warm and Cool Mist Humidifier has a lot of features. You can choose if you want a cool or warm mist and how much mist you want to come out (low, medium, high - medium is the default setting). You can choose which way the mist goes by moving the spout. The humidifier has a timer so you can have it run for four, eight, or twelve hours. It has a nightlight feature that you can turn on or off to. Finally, there is an indicator that will let you know when it is time to refill the tank.This is a huge humidifier! I am using this in my living room/dining room and it is large enough that it works well in both rooms. Because it is so big, the tank gets quite heavy when you fill it with water. I needed help holding it so beware of that when using it. The humidifier works really well and, despite the size, it is very quiet. I find the medium setting for the mist is just right - low didn't generate enough mist for my liking and high generated way too much mist. The timer feature works well - I like the fact that I can set it for eight hours and it automatically shuts off after I've used it all night. The tank is surprisingly easy to clean and even comes with a cleaning brush. While the product description says the humidifier is factory reconditioned, the only hint of that I saw of that was in the instruction manual which was photocopied. Other than that, the humidifier looks and runs like it is brand-new.I really like the Pure Guardian 120 Hour Ultrasonic Warm and Cool Mist Humidifier.

This Solar Motion Sensor Light is waterproof and rechargeable. It has a function switch that offers you four choices: off; a) the solar light turns on automatically at night; b) the light is always on but strongest when people go through the light sensing area and turns dim when they leave the area; and (c) human body induction function - the light is strong when people go through the light sensing area and turns off when people leave the area. It takes about six hours for the Motion Sensor Light to charge.Even before using this Solar Motion Sensor Light I was impressed by the packaging. Besides the light, it comes with a full-sized screwdriver (never had that happen before) as well as a drilling location map so you know exactly where to place the screws to hang the light (again, never had that happen before.)After charging and using the light, I am even more impressed.  I put this outside my front door - before I did that I used to leave the porch light on when I went out at night - I love the fact that this is saving me money on my electric bill. Thanks to the drilling location map, it was very easy to hang the light. I am using it on setting â€œcâ€ - the light turns on when I am in the area and shuts off when I leave. I am very happy with how well that works (you do have to unscrew the cover to change the settings which means you have to take down the light each time you want to change the settings - I wish the switch was easier to reach). The light is very bright and I have no problem seeing the keyhole so I can easily unlock the door. The light lasts long enough for me to unlock the door and get safely inside my house. The light recharges quite well, even in the fall when the daylight is short and scarce.I'm very pleased with this Solar Motion Sensor Light.I received this product in exchange for an honest review.

My iPad2 is old, beat up, and needs updating  but still works well for my needs. My only issue with the iPad is that I tend to run through charging cables a lot â€“ they simply stop working after awhile. When my last charging cable stopped working altogether, I ordered this charger and I have been very happy with it. It charges my iPad2 quickly and completely. The cable is nice and long so I can use my iPad while it is charging. The cable stores away neatly when I am done charging the iPad.This charging cable works really well.

This Rechargeable LED Lantern has three light settings: low, strong, SOS. It has an external battery pack so you can charge your phone, MP3 player, tablet, and other devices. The lantern has a magnetic base and comes with a hook for easy hanging.I have to admit that when I first received this lantern I was surprised at how small it is and thought for sure it wouldn't work effectively. To my surprise and delight it works really well. Even at the lowest setting, the light is quite bright and lights up a lot of space. I am not using this lantern for camping but to keep in case we lose power (which happens quite a bit in my neighborhood) so I will not only have light but a battery pack to charge my phone when the power does go out. I tested the battery charger on my cell phone and it did a good job. While it comes with a magnetic base it doesnâ€™t stick all that well, but the attached handle comes in quite handy.I am very pleased with this Rechargeable LED Lantern. Besides using it for camping, you can use it during a power outage, keep it in your car to have in case of an emergency,  keep it in a closet to use to search for items, and many more ways. It may be small but it is quite versatile.I received this product for free in exchange for a review.

Librarian Lindsey Norris loves her job at Briar Creek Public Library and cares about everyone who comes in there. Part of her job involves delivering books to people who can't make it to the library, including eccentric brothers Stewart and Peter Rosen. Much to her dismay, on one of her trips she find Peter Rosen dead - shot in the chest - and Stewart Rosen is nowhere to be found. Stewart seems the most likely suspect, but Lindsey isn't convinced and she, along with her friends, tries to clear his name.â€œA Likely Storyâ€ is the nicely done sixth book in Jenn McKinlay's Library Lovers cozy mystery series. I love the library setting and the cast of characters in this series, including Lindsey, Sully, Beth (I love Bethâ€™s storyline in this book), Charlene, Mary, Violet, Milton, Robbie, even Ms. Cole. The mystery is well plotted (McKinlay does an excellent job of describing the Rosen's booby-trapped house) with just the right amount of suspense and more than a few twists , so even though I thought I had the killer figured out I was completely surprised at events that happened towards the end of the book. The one thing I don't like about this book (and series) is the ongoing Lindsey/Sully/Robbie love triangle. While there are some nice humorous bits between the two men, I find the love triangle to be distracting - often taking me away from the mystery. I wish Lindsey would pick one or the other and get this ongoing storyline over with.Besides the main novel, â€œA Likely Storyâ€ contains a reader's guide to Josephine Teyâ€™s â€œThe Daughter of Timeâ€, a craft project, recipes, and a cute short story.

This AGPTEK Cable Sleeve is 59 inches long and 5.3 inches wide.  It has Velcro on the sides to form it into a tube to hold your cable wires.  It is reversible so you can use either the black side or white side - whichever side you like best.I love this cable sleeve!  Since it is so long I was able to cut it in half and use it in two rooms.  I am using part of the sleeve in my living room to hold my cable wires, the wires from my Wii, and my home theater wires - before I got the sleeve the wires were a tangled web behind my TV, now they are neatly stored away and actually make my room look nicer.  I am using the rest of the cable sleeve in my bedroom where I have a second TV, cable box, and DVD player.  Again it makes the room look so much neater!  Although I have a lot of wires in each room, I had no issue fitting them into each tube.  The cable sleeve is very easy to put together and I love the fact that I have a choice of colors when using it.I really like this AGPTEK Cable Sleeve.I received this product for free in exchange for a review.

I am on the computer all day long at work and consequently my right wrist (my dominant hand) has really been bothering me - to the point that simply trying to twist the cap off a tube of toothpaste can be very painful.  Because of that, I jumped at the chance to use and review Aegend Breathable Adjustable Sports Neoprene Hand Wrist Support.For the most part I have been very happy with the Aegend Breathable Adjustable Sports Neoprene Hand Wrist Support.  It is very easy to use -simply stick your thumb into the hole provided and wrap the wrist support around your wrist (you can use this on either wrist).  It works well - I notice no pain when wearing it and notice pain when I don't wear it.  It is lightweight which makes it perfect to carry around in my pocketbook, pocket, or bag so I always have it nearby when I need it.  Because it is lightweight, I barely even notice it, even when I am typing or writing.  My one issue with this wrist support is that the material around the thumb hole is a bit flimsy and tends to slip a bit while I am wearing it, but that doesn't affect my typing or writing so I have gotten used to it.I really like the Aegend Breathable Adjustable Sports Neoprene Hand Wrist Support.I received this product for free in exchange for review.

The Panasonic ES-RT97-S Men's Electric Shaver and Trimmer with Cleaning System has a three blade cutting system with 30 degree blades. It is a wet/dry shaver so you can use it while taking a shower if you like. It has a built-in rechargeable battery, a trimmer combing attachment for your beard, and a protective cap on the razor. The razor comes with a self-cleaning charging terminal and detergent (you can also charge the razor without cleaning it).The man who lives in my house has long wanted this razor but lacked the money to buy it so he was happy to have a chance to use this. He is thrilled with it! The razor gives him a nice clean shave without any irritation (he doesn't have a beard so can't try out the trimmer). He usually prefers manual razors because he thinks they give him a closer shave but was very pleased with the results after shaving with this razor. The razor comes fully charged and a full charge will last for approximately eighteen shaves (three minutes each shave). When you need to charge the razor it takes about an hour to recharge (the charge status light turns off when it is done charging). It is very easy to clean which is nice since it gets quite messy by the time he is done shaving.This is a nice razor and will get much use in my house.

The iHealth HS6 Core Body Analysis Scale does a number of things. It not only gives you your weight, it measures your body composition index, room temperature and humidity, calculates your fat, lean mass, muscle bone mass, water, and visceral fat rate. This scale uses Wi-Fi technology and using the iHealth My Vitals App you can measure your calorie intake and set goals for yourself. The scale stores data for up to ten people.I picked this scale because I was intrigued at all it can do but in the end I think I am better off with a plain old regular scale (do I really need a scale that tells me room temperature and humidity? No.). It took two of us a day and a half to get the scale working - setting up the Wi-Fi technology was frustrating. We have two cell phones and three tablets and could only get the app working on one phone. Once I did get the app activated I found it very hard to navigate and there was nothing on the app that I couldn't find someplace else. Measuring our weight was also frustrating until we figured out the scale will not work on carpeted floors - once we realized that, the scale worked somewhat okay. My weight was accurate but a family member weighed himself after a doctorâ€™s appointment and there was a four pound difference between what this scale said and what the doctorâ€™s scale said. Finally, I have no room on my bathroom floor to keep this and the scale is heavy which means it isn't the easiest thing to pull out when I need it.Some people may like this scale but it has more features than I need.

Anâ€™gel and Dickce Ducote, along with their ward Benjy, their dog Peanut, and their cat Endora travel to Louisiana for a wedding and what they hope will be a pleasant visit with relatives.  Their hopes are quickly dashed, however ,by the amount of tension among their relatives.  As unsettling as that is, nothing prepares them for the murder of the bride-to-be.  Her death won't be the first one and soon Anâ€™gel and Dickce are once again involved in a murder investigation.â€œDead with the Windâ€ (a great title with a theme that is carried throughout the book) is the nicely done second book in Miranda Jamesâ€™ Southern Ladies cozy mystery series.  (Miranda James is the pen name of author Dean James).  Anâ€™gel and Dickce are great characters - octogenarians who arenâ€™t afraid to speak their mind (especially Anâ€™gel).  Benjy, Peanut, and Endora are also delightful characters with the animals often being better behaved than the humans.  Anâ€™gel and Dickce's relatives are more complicated which makes the mystery harder to solve.  James does a wonderful job with the mystery, planting just enough clothes for the reader to solve the mystery alongside Anâ€™gel and Dickce (I figured out some of the clues; other events in the novel took me by surprise).  This clever plotting and writing, as well as the Gone with the Wind theme throughout the book (I just love the last paragraph!) make this a delightful book to read.â€œDead with the Windâ€ is another great cozy mystery by Miranda James.

On the surface, it looks like all Raneh has to worry about is finding a husband.  But Raneh has a secret - she has magic which is forbidden for landowners to have.  She tries to hide it but when the ruler finds out she wants Reyna killed.  Raneh struggles to stay alive but can she do enough?â€œThe Keeper and the Rulershipâ€ is a delightful fantasy for readers of all ages.  Author Emily Martha Sorensen has created a nicely done world in which people freely get to choose their roles â€“ landowner, mathematician, vassal, magician - yet they have to follow strict rules for whatever role they pick. All of this is overseen by a ruler (and to a lesser extent her husband) who likes to collect hairs.  The book has some great concepts â€“ I especially love the author's concept of status (I kept picturing cell phone like bars over people's heads!).  Sorensen has a wonderful way with words not only in creating characterâ€™s first and last names but the food they eat.  While there is certainly a nice amount of tension in the book there is also a great deal of hope in it, mostly due to the actions of Raneh.  She is a great heroine - never acting just for herself but for the good of everyone.  She is one of the best heroines I have seen in a book like this and definitely makes this book worth reading.â€œThe Keeper and the Rulershipâ€ is a nice fantasy novel for readers of all ages.I received this book for free in exchange for a review.

The mouse I use at work is old, dirty, and it doesn't work all that well, so I have been looking to get a new one.  Trying to get my IT department to issue a new mouse is like pulling teeth so I was happy to have the chance to use and review the Ruban 2.4 G. Wireless Optical Mouse.I have been really pleased with this mouse.  It is my first time using a wireless mouse and I am thrilled with the results - no more wires getting caught up in the papers on in desk!  It is very easy to set up - simply take the USB receiver from the battery compartment and the mouse and insert it into your computer.  Put the batteries into the mouse, turn on the mouse, and you are good to go.  The mouse started working immediately for me and I have been very happy with it.  The only issue I have found is that the mouse tends to freeze up at times but a click of the left mouse button unfreezes it and the more I use the mouse the less it tends to freeze up.  I do shut the mouse off at night to preserve the battery life - the mouse starts working as soon as I turn it back on.I really like the Ruban 2.4 G. Wireless Optical Mouse!I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

I have used a lot of nail polish over the years and Cutex Regular Polish Remover is among the best I have used. It does an excellent job of removing my nail polish even when I have nail art (including stick on decorations). I find a little of this nail polish remover goes a long way â€“ if I wet a large cotton ball with this nail polish remover, it removes the polish from two or three nails before I have to reapply the remover to a new cotton ball. There is a slight odor, but nothing overwhelming, and it disappears once I have washed my hands.I really like Cutex Regular Polish Remover.

I bought this Garbage Disposal Stopper when mine broke and I had to wait for someone to fix it. All in all, it works pretty well as a temporary measure. It fits nicely in my sink and does a good job of holding the water in the sink, although the water does slowly leak out - not a huge issue since there is plenty of water left to do the dishes. The other problem I have found is that the stopper does tend to get dirty quickly. I wash it every so often to keep it clean.This Garbage Disposal Stopper isnâ€™t perfect but does a good enough job.

My armchair is old and beat up, in large part because my cats use it as a scratching post (completely ignoring the scratching post right next to it!).  Rather than buy a new armchair and give the cats a new expensive scratching post, I decided to buy this slipcover instead. For the most part, I am pretty happy with it. I love the burgundy color - it completely transforms my armchair and brightens up the entire room. The slipcover is large and fits my armchair perfectly. My only issue with the slipcover is that, while it is easy to tuck the slipcover in between the armchair cushions, it simply doesn't stay tucked in after people have been sitting on it - I am forever tucking it back in. This isnâ€™t too bad since there are only two people living in my house and we rarely have visitors, but it would be a bit embarrassing if we did have company - I would probably remove the slipcover if I did.This slipcover may not be for everyone but it works perfectly for me (and my cats).

My sofa is old and beat up, in large part because my cats use it as a scratching post (completely ignoring the scratching post right next to it!).  Rather than buy a new sofa and give the cats a new expensive scratching post, I decided to buy this slipcover instead. For the most part, I am pretty happy with it. My cats, like most cats, let me know whether or not they like a particular brand of cat food and they let me know within seconds that they love Wellness Core Natural Grain Free Dry Cat Food. The bag wasn't in my house for more than five minutes when one of my cats managed to tear a hole in the bottom of the bag and started eating the cat food! Since the instructions say to gradually introduce cats to this cat food by first mixing it in with their current food, I quickly took the bag away from them but now that I have fully introduced this cat food to them they gobble it right down. They have had no issues while eating this food - no upset stomachs or messy litter boxes - and really seem to enjoy this cat food.

With two cats and two litter boxes, I go through a lot of kitty litter and am always willing to try different brands so was happy to have a chance to try Cat's Pride Fresh and Light Kitty Litter, Unscented. I am glad I did - I am very happy with it. Although there is only twelve pounds of kitty litter (I usually use fourteen pounds) there is more than enough litter to fill a litter box. The litter is easy to pour dust free - I didn't see any dust while I was pouring it. While it is advertised as unscented, I did detect a light scent that does a good job of masking odors - my cats use their litter boxes so much that the room I keep the litter boxes in can get quite smelly at times but with this kitty litter I don't notice any odor at all. The litter is very easy to scoop up after my cats are done using it. My cats seem to like this litter â€“ at least they havenâ€™t complained to me about it!I am quite pleased with Cat's Pride Fresh and Light Kitty Litter, Unscented.

I have two cats who use the two litter boxes I have a lot - it seems like I am always scooping out their litter boxes. Because of this, I go through a lot of kitty litter and have tried many brands. For the most part, I am very happy with Cat's Pride Fresh and Light Kitty Litter. While this is only twelve pounds of kitty litter as opposed to the fourteen pounds I usually use, there is more than enough litter for a litter box. The litter is easy to pour and pretty much dust free - I didn't see any dust while I was pouring it. The kitty litter has a nice light scent that isn't overwhelming but does a good job of masking odors - my cats use their litter boxes so much that they can get quite smelly at times but with this kitty litter I don't notice any odor at all. The litter is very easy to scoop up after my cats have done their thing, which is great because my cats do their thing a lot! The one thing I don't like is how much litter is ending up outside the litter box. My cats seem to like this litter so I am thinking it might be too light. Whatever the issue is, it means I am vacuuming the room where the litter boxes are twice as often as I have to when using other kitty litter :-(

Dove Deodorant Clinical Powder Soft can be used in the morning or at night right before going to bed. It Reduces underarm wetness and is designed to last through the day. It is lightly scented and moisturizes and conditions your skin.When buying a deodorant I am looking for three things: something that will last all day, smells nice without being overwhelming, and won't stain my clothes. Dove Deodorant Clinical Powder does all three things. While the box says the deodorant can be applied before going to bed at night and will last all the next day, I am used to putting deodorant on in the morning ( a habit I have that I can't break although some say it is better to put it on at night) and it has worked fine for me. I have exercised in the hot weather and this deodorant has stood up very well even as I sweat while exercising. The scent is a nice pleasant one - it reminds me of baby powder. Finally, I have lost count of how many times I put on deodorant, put on a shirt, gone to work, and once at work noticed the deodorant hadn't quite dried after I put it on and has stained the bottom of my shirt. This has not been an issue with this deodorant and I love that I no longer have to worry about stains on my clothes!I am very happy with Dove Deodorant Clinical Powder Soft.

For the most part, Professor Greg â€œGingerâ€ McConnell is well-liked and well respected. Therefore, his murder shocks the residents of Crozet, Virginia. Like many others, Mary Minor â€œHarryâ€ Haristeen liked Ginger and is upset by his death. Soon she finds herself investigating his murder and once again her prying puts her in very real danger.â€œTail Gaitâ€ is one of the better recent books in Rita Mae Brownâ€™s Mrs. Murphy mystery series. Absent from this book is the preachiness that has infected Brown's later books in the series and this allows readers to sit back and enjoy the mystery without feeling like they are being lectured to. The mystery is well done, although I did figure out towards the end of the killer. Interspersed with the current mystery is a story from the Revolutionary War that eventually ties into the current mystery. Brown does an excellent job with this by not only letting readers know what happened to the people in the older story but adding a nice twist that eventually affects the modern-day mystery. The one thing I didn't like about this book is the absence of many of the characters that have been an important part of the series all along - Boom Boom is only mentioned at the beginning of the book, Harryâ€™s husband Fair is absent for most of the book, and Little Mim and Big Mim aren't even mentioned. And this is the second book in which Harry is referred to as Harriet - what's up with that?A few quirks aside, Tail Gait is another nice mystery by Rita Mae Brown.I received this book for free in exchange for an honest review.

I love to sit outside as much as I can when the weather is nice in the spring, summer, and even the fall.  The problem is, I have no shed and I have very little room to store outdoor furniture inside my house when the winter comes.  Brylane Home Zero Gravity Chair with Canopy and Pillow is just what I am looking for - it is a nice comfortable lounge chair that folds for easy storage.I am very happy with this lounge chair!  I am prone to back, neck, and shoulder pain but haven't noticed any while using this chair (or afterwards for that matter) like I have with other outdoor lounge chairs.  This chair goes from a sitting straight position to reclining to the point where your feet are about level with your head - a perfect position to take a nap. It is very easy to move the chair from position to position and the chair stays firmly in whatever position I select.  I tend to sunburn very easily so the canopy is a must have (I also wear sunscreen and make sure that the chair is in the shade at all times for extra protection).  While the chair comes with an attached pillow, I don't find it all that comfortable so I keep it hanging on the back side of the chair and don't use it.  While the chair is a bit heavy â€“ I wouldn't take this to the beach with me if I had to walk a long distance from my car to the beach - I move it around my yard following the shade with no problem at all.  Best of all, come wintertime I can simply fold up the chair and stored in my basement.I love this lounge chair!

This is a nice sized messenger bag with a large main compartment that zippers (there is also a small zipper pocket within the main compartment; two front compartments that you close with snaps; and a pocket on each side of the bag. The bag is dark brown and made of 100% cotton canvas. It has an adjustable shoulder strap so you can easily carry it around.I love this messenger bag! You can use it in a variety of ways: to pack clothes for an overnight trip; to pack your gym clothes; to store your laptop; you can even use it for sports items such as baseballs, footballs, basketballs, etc. I am using this primarily for work. My office is off-campus and I am constantly traveling to the main campus for meetings. I have been lugging lots of paper reports, a notebook, and my iPad to these meetings. I love the fact that I can fit all that in this messenger bag - it makes getting to the meetings so much easier! I put my cell phone in one of the side pockets and use the front pockets on the bag for items like my work ID, pens, and pencils. I use the small inside pocket for my car and house keys. I put my paperwork and iPad in the main compartment - the main compartment of the last messenger bag I had did not zip up so I really love the fact that this bag has a zipper - I love the added security.I am really pleased with this messenger bag and use it all the time.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

While her parents celebrate their 50th wedding anniversary, Nola Mae Harper has returned home to Cays Mill, Georgia to help run the family peach farm.  Nola Mae soon finds out that there are financial issues with the peach farm and wonders if there is anything she can do to help.  However, her family will soon really need her help when a dead body turns up in the peach trees and her brother-in-law is the main suspect.  Nola Mae tries to what she can to clear his name but will it be enough?â€œPeaches and Screamâ€ is the first book in Susan Furlongâ€™s Georgia Peach cozy mystery series and the book is as delightful as the cute title.  Furlong has done a wonderful job in creating Nola Mae, letting little details about her past trickle into the story until readers feel like they know her.  She is an intrepid heroine, reinventing her life more than once, troubled by a secret from her past that caused her to flee Cays Mill, yet willing to return do whatever she can to help her family.  Equally well-done is the portrayal of Nola Maeâ€™s family members - her very pregnant sister Ida, her troubled brother-in-law Hollis, and her brother Ray.  Although I am not overly fond of peaches, I loved reading about the peach farm and the various dishes made with the peaches as well as the general running of the farm. The mystery itself is well plotted with plenty of twists and turns, including a nifty twist towards the end of the book.  Don't be surprised if you think you have figured out who the killer is only to find Furlong has a few tricks up her sleeve -well done!â€œPeaches and Screamâ€ is a great start to what I hope will be a long-running cozy mystery series.

Both of my cats love cat treats and would eat them several times a day if allowed.  I only give them treats once a day and one of my cats seems to know exactly what time she will get the treats because comes looking for me and cries until she gets the treats.  Since both cats love cat treats so much I gladly took Wellness Kittles Grain Free Natural Cat Treats thinking this would be a healthy alternative to the other cat treats they eat.Much to my surprise, the cat who loves cat treats the most (the one who cries the same time every night for them), took one sniff of these treats, looked at me as if to say â€œyou've got to be kidding meâ€ and refused to eat them â€“ she didnâ€™t even take a nibble.  My other cat, who loves to eat anything and everything, gobbled these treats right down.While I like the idea of healthy cat treats, it is not worth it to me to buy these when only one cat will eat them.  However, if both cats ate these, I would certainly buy them.

In an effort to eat healthier, I have pretty much given up on eating junk food such as potato chips and try to eat healthier options like fruit instead. However, sometimes I just want something crunchy to eat and decided to try Rhythm Superfoods Kale Chips Cool Ranch. I shared them with family members and I ended up with mixed results as to whether or not people liked them. The chips were all broken up when I got them, so it was very hard to get a good idea of what they tasted like unless I used a spoon to eat them. Once I did get a good sample I thought they were just okay. A bit too earthy and crunchy and not very flavorful for my liking. A family member, on the other hand, really liked these chips and plans on buying more and he's usually a very fussy eater!While I didn't particularly like Rhythm Superfoods Kale Chips Cool Ranch, other family members did so your mileage may vary.

The iHomeset Electric Aromatherapy Ultrasonic Essential Oil Diffuser is very easy to use. Simply add water to the fill line (a small measuring cup is included,) add one or two drops of essential oils, and turn the diffuser on. You have the option of having the diffuser run continuously or for it to diffuse for three minutes, stop diffusing for one minute, and then diffuse again. The diffuser runs for four to eight hours before it needs refilling.I really like the iHomeset Electric Aromatherapy Ultrasonic Essential Oil Diffuser. I am using it in a spare bedroom where I keep not only my cats litter boxes but my home computer. Because of the litter boxes, the room can get a bit smelly at times no matter how often I clean them which makes it a bit uncomfortable to sit in the room while I am using the computer. This diffuser gives out a light, noticeable but not overwhelming, scent that completely masks the odor from the litter boxes I have been using this on the run three minutes/pause for one minute cycle). This diffuser also has a series of colored lights (blue, red, and green that you can program to cycle with the options of running all three colors, run two colors, run only one color, or not have any colored lights at all. I really like this feature - I find it very soothing, however, I would not use this feature if I were to use this diffuser at night, as it would be distracting and keep me awake. This diffuser is very quiet - you can't hear it running at all. The only thing I don't like about this diffuser are the instructions which can be hard to follow and are a bit odd at times -  I am pretty sure you don't need a bayonet to open the water tank! However, this diffuser is easy to use and operating it will come pretty intuitively to most users.I really like the iHomeset Electric Aromatherapy Ultrasonic Essential Oil Diffuser.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

I make my own lunch for work and have been trying to bring in healthy choices, including fruits and vegetables. Unfortunately, while my lunch is healthy, it tends to be on the large size and I have been looking for a bag that will hold my lunch in it including the various fruits, veggies, and beverages I bring in.The Extreme Pack Cooler Bag with Zip Out Liner is just what I have been looking for - in fact, it is larger than what I really need (it is 12 ¼â€ x 9" x 9 Â½)". I easily fit in a container of ziti, a bowl of cereal, yogurt, grapes, a bottle of water, and a bottle of Gatorade into this bag with room to spare. This bag is roomy with a zippered main compartment, a zippered front compartment (a good place to put an ice pack) and two zippered side pockets. It has two carrying handles as well as a shoulder strap. The bag is easy to clean. While the bag is big, it does an excellent job of keeping my food cold - besides taking this to work I could easily take this along on picnics. The only â€œissueâ€ I have with this is how much room it takes up in the fridge - I end up separating my lunch once I am in work and keeping the nonperishable items in the this bag (which I put under my desk) and transferring the perishable items into a smaller lunch bag so I am not taking up a lot of space in the work refrigerator.The Extreme Pack Cooler Bag with Zip Out Liner is just what I need!

The HP Eco-Efficient Copy Paper is lightweight which means you get more paper in a ream - 625 sheets instead of 500 and the box weighs less. However, lightweight also means thin - at least in the case of this paper - and this paper is very thin. If I hold it up to the light and put my hand behind it I can see my hand right through the paper. However, for the most part the thinness of the paper has not been an issue for me. It works fine in my printer at home - I have had no issues with the paper jamming in the printer. The paper does a good job of printing my documents but I would not advise trying to print two-sided documents. Besides using it in a printer, this paper would also be good for drawing, especially for young children to use. While this paper is fine for the documents I print at home - things like recipes and my grocery list - I certainly wouldn't use it in my office. The paper is too thin to be professional looking.HP E Eco-Efficient Copy Paper isn't perfect but works just fine for home use.

This Paper Mate Pencil Pack comes with four mechanical pencils, twelve lead refills, and two eraser refills. Each pencil features a different character from the Avengers.In my spare time I like to do puzzles (crossword puzzles, cryptograms, word search puzzles, acrostics, etc.).  Although I have been solving puzzles for years, I like to use pencils instead of pens when solving them so I can erase any mistakes I make. This can be an issue when I am, for example, at the beach and the lead on my pencil wears down or breaks and I don't have a pencil sharpener with me. These Paper Mate pencils are a perfect solution to that problem. These pencils have plenty of lead and when the lead runs low you just push the eraser and more lead comes down. Lead refills are included and when you run out of lead the pencil is easy to reload. Both the pencil and lead are thicker than other mechanical pencils I have used so, while these pencils are fine for activities like writing and puzzle solving, they might not be suitable for drawing.These Paper Mate Pencils are just what I was looking for.

The Yoga Mat and Hand Towel Set I got from YogaAddict contains a hand towel (15" x 24") and a mat sized towel (24" x 72").  Both are machine washable and fold up  so they are easy to carry.I have been taking yoga classes at a local recreation center and, while I love the classes and my instructors, I am not so fond of the recreation center.  The floor is dirty and I often feel dirty and grimy after taking a class there.  I can take a shower afterwards but I worry about the dirt and germs on my yoga mat so I was thrilled to be offered a chance to try this Yoga Mat and Hand Towel Set.So far I have been pleased with both.  The Yoga Mat Towel fits perfectly over my yoga mat (there is a pocket in one corner for extra security) and the traction is good - I haven't slid during any yoga poses.  The hand towel does a good job of drying my hands when they start to get sweaty.  The towels wash up easily and come out nice and clean.  With the warmer weather I am taking outdoor yoga classes as well as indoor yoga classes and have been putting the yoga towel underneath my mat to protect it from the grass.  So far it is doing an excellent job!I'm very happy with this Yoga Mat and Hand Towel Set.I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

The picture for this necklace doesn't do it justice - this is one of the prettiest necklaces I own. It is small, yet delicate. While it is not the most expensive necklace I own, it doesn't look cheap - in fact it looks like it cost much more than it does. The colors on this necklace really shine and stand out. I get several compliments on the necklace every time I wear it. The chain is just the right length - it looks nice with both a top with a high neckline and a top with a lower cut neckline. My one complaint - and the reason I gave this necklace four stars instead of five - is the lobster claw clasp. I have a hard time getting it closed on my own and the male in my house canâ€™t get it closed either as his fingers are too thick. I have been having a co-worker fasten the necklace for me when I wear it. Since that is impractical on a daily basis, I am going to switch out chains so I can wear this necklace without any help.Outside of the lobster claw clasp, I really like this necklace and plan on wearing it on a regular basis.

While she is waiting for the insurance money needed to rebuild her bookstore, Tricia Miles has been volunteering at the Chamber of Commerce. Her work there has brought her even closer to her sister Angelica so Tricia is devastated when she learns that Angelica has been keeping a major secret from her. As upset as she is though, that is nothing compared to how Tricia feels when she stumbles across the body of Pete Rehnquist. Tricia has solved murders before but she doesn't realize this one will cost her dearly and change her life forever.â€œA Fatal Chapterâ€ is the ninth book in Lorna Barrettâ€™s Booktown Cozy Mystery Series and it is one of the best entries in the series. The relationship between Angelica and Tricia has grown throughout the series and it grows even deeper in this book. Angelica has changed much since the first book and we, along with Tricia, continue to learn that Angelica is full of surprises. Booktown (Stoneham, New Hampshire) is one of my favorite cozy mystery locations and I can't wait until Tricia can open her bookstore again. As for the mystery itself, there is little I can say without spoiling the book except to say â€œWowâ€! This book is full of surprises - some happy and some sad (I cried a bit towards the end). I will say that Barrett has tricks up her sleeve that I have never seen another cozy mystery writer pull off - well done. As for what else happens - you'll have to read the book yourself!Long-time readers of the Booktown cozy mysteries will love this book. If you have not read the other books in the series you may not want to read â€œA Fatal Chapterâ€ since it references past events. Instead, start with the first book in the series - you won't be disappointed!

These Ziploc Containers hold three cups worth of food. They come four in a pack and can be used in the refrigerator, freezer, microwave (vent lid when using it in the microwave), and dishwasher. They are designed to be stacked on top of each other to save room when storing them.In order to save money, I bring my own lunch into work and consequently I am always looking for storage containers because mine wear out after a while. These Ziploc Containers are perfect for what I need. Granted they won't last forever but they do last quite awhile and are inexpensive enough that I donâ€™t mind when they finally do wear out. The containers hold quite a bit of food and are easy to clean and store when I am done with them. I have been using these containers for a number of things - for example: lasagna, spaghetti, pasta salad, chicken potpie, shepherds pie â€“and they have been perfect for all of those. These containers fit nicely in my lunch bag and stack neatly in the refrigerator. I had no issue at all using them in the freezer and microwave.I am very pleased with these Ziploc Containers.

The Super Cat Kitty Condo Starter Kit is made of cardboard and comes with: two condo bases; two condo tops; one condo tube; loop fastener tape (64 pieces); hook fastener tape (eight pieces); and four condo clips. Also included is a play-activated catnip marker. You can put the assembled condo boxes on top of each other or side-by-side with a condo tube connecting them. You can buy more kits to make a city of condos.I would love to buy my two cats a real cat tree but can't afford one at the moment. I thought the Super Cat Kitty Condo Starter Kit would be a good alternative especially because it is made of cardboard and my cats love to sleep in cardboard boxes. So far, however, I had mixed results with this product. It is certainly easy to assemble and you have several ways you can assemble it, including how many windows you want the condo to have. Because it is cardboard, I thought my cats would eventually destroy it with their claws but so far it is still standing. Unfortunately, the reason for that may e because my cats don't seem all that interested in it. One of my cats doesn't use it at all - even though she weighs less than ten pounds the condo is a tight fit for her. My other cat, who weighs about a pound lighter than the first cat, does like to sleep in the condo occasionally. However, that is all she does with it - sleep in it. She doesn't play in it and even if she did there is no way she would fit in the tube connecting the two condos. In fact, I doubt that any cat larger than a kitten would be able to fit in the tube.I like the idea of the Super Cat Kitty Condo Starter Kit but it isn't quite the right fit for my cats.

I first discovered Agatha Christie a long time ago when I was ten or eleven years old. Through the years (more years than I want to admit!) I have read and reread her books to the point where I can often remember who the culprit is. Still, Dame Agatha is a always treasure and, since it had been a few years since I have read her short stories, I eagerly dived into â€œMiss Marple The Complete Short storiesâ€.As I said, I have read Agatha Christieâ€™s works many times, but I still enjoyed rereading these short stories (and wish there were more). I have always gone back-and-forth as to whom I like best, Hercules Poirot or Miss Jane Marple, but I have to admit Miss Marple has a special place in my heart. You just have to love how this sweet, innocent, somewhat flustered little old lady manages to outwit everybody else when it comes to solving mysteries - every single time. For the most part the short stories are very clever although when they are all in one collection you begin recognizing common themes - people do spend a lot of time impersonating other people for example - and one title unfortunately gives away the identity of the killer. Still, there are some nice twists and turns in many of these stories. Some of my favorite stories in this collection are â€œThe Bloodstained Pavementâ€, â€œThe Blue Geraniumâ€, â€œThe Case of the Perfect Maidâ€, â€œTape-Measure Murderâ€, â€œGreenshawâ€™s Follyâ€, and â€œSanctuaryâ€.Through the years, I have read many mysteries by many other authors but Agatha Christie will always be my favorite. She was one of the best at what she did and this collection of short stories is no exception. Well done!

This package contains two small (4" x 5" x 4.25") storage containers. They can be used separately or together (there are clips included if you want to put them together).These containers may be small but they hold a lot of items. I have a lot of supplies for my fingernails â€“ polish, nail files, cuticle remover, nail art, etc. and I am using one storage container for my nail supplies. They it all fit in nicely in the storage container and I like having my supplies in one location (previously I was keeping most of them in a freezer bag in a drawer inmy nightstand - I love having that drawer space back!). I am using the other storage container to store various office supplies â€“ pens, stamps, Post-it Notes, paperclips, staples, etc. and again, while the container is small, there is more than enough room for everything. The one drawback I have found is that the container is too tall to fit in my nightstand drawer - in fact most of my drawers - so I put it on top of the nightstand instead of in it.I really like these storage containers.

Life has a way of giving second chance on love. No matter time or distance true love will always find you especially if is your second chance at romance.Olivia and Zander's story started when they were kids, when Zander moved next door to Olivia. When their love and friendship ends neither of them realized it would take thirteen years to finally have their happy ending.The plot on this story is powerful, Olivia is a wonderful person yet in the eyes of his mother she is not good enough for him. However knowing how low his mother thinks of her she still helps her out. Her love and compassion has no limit and that is why Zander never stopped loving her.This story has a happy ending and the message that delivers is so powerful is incredible.I founded amazing and loved the book. I honestly recommend this book you will love it too.Gifted by author in exchange for an honest review.https://www.facebook.com/BookaholicandMoreBlog

5 Star Review.Staying away on Christma Vicki thought she was doing the right thing. This was her time to hide until the holidays were over but her holidays were going to get very interesting once Jonathan enters her life.Jonathan was content being alone, he had giving up on everything he believed even on love. Knowing he was destined to be all by himself and realized he will never be able to see. But the last thing he thought was Vicki walking into his dark life and brightening with the love and compassion she had.Vicki and Jonathan's love story will bring you a warm fussy feeling not only because is about Christmas but the love this two characters have for each other you will want them to be real.If this is an indication of how good this Box Set is then you gotta read it and the price is not bad at all!!!Gifted by author in exchange for an honest review.https://www.facebook.com/BookaholicandMoreBlog

Kierra's life had to make a different turned once Chandler dropped the shocker of her life. Now she is living in Vegas going strong with school she is in a place where she can think of Chandler and not cry. But like always things don't stay the way they are.Chandler's life has also change now he is not only without Kierra but he has a son. Having to let her go has been so difficult on him knowing he can't give her what she wants but how can he be happy with that when he knows how he truly feels about her.When Chandler tells Kierra to explore her needs I couldn't believe that, and when she went and did it I was not happy with her. However the twist the story took was nice for a minute but deep down I really wanted them together. The way this two kept me on my toes was good, but the hot steamy sex scenes Kierra had with her new master by Chandler's request of her to explored her horizons no less, was so freaking hot my poor kindle was melting. Not only that I was left fanning myself with those scenes.The way this story ended was the way Kierra and Chandler's story was intended.  Would I recommend this story yes, will I warned people to be aware of the explicit sex? Definitely yes!!!I wish this series would continue there are some characters I would love to see how they ended up.Gifted by author in exchange for an honest review.

As I read this book, my head is trying to stop spinning and my heart is trying to leap out of my chest.  The emotional rollercoaster lives of Kiara Foster and Chandler Thorne will leave you the same way it left me scratching my head and holding my breath.This story has so many WOW moments, you will not be able to put the book down until it is finished. For me there were times I was so upset at Chandler but I understood where he was coming from as for Kiara she found exactly what she needed to be able to move on with her life and put that horrible nightmare she survived behind once and for all.I won't tell  you this book is your typical love story there are situations that will make some readers uncomfortable and I can tell you is read it with an open mind.If you are looking for a hot, crazy, emotional story this book is for you. I recommend this book.This book was gifted by author in exchange for an honest review.

''' 4 Star Review'''Please remember this are fictional characters and here on our page we do not approved of cheating. With that being said let me tell you about Sara Klein, she has been best friends with Emily Bruel since they were babies. But that didn't stop Sara from keeping her true self from her best friend. She lived in a whole new world that she fabricated with lies and deception, something she learned from her "perfect" parents.Being in love with Jeff since she was fifteen years old and loosing her virginity at eighteen to him she believed everything he told her, even keeping her as his little dirty secret and becoming his mistress after he married someone else. Sara knows she has gone too far with Jeff and eventually she must severed all ties to him, but that is easier said than done since he has something they both dreamed of having together.William "Liam" Knight has been plotting revenged on his sister's suicide to Louis and Emily Bruel but when life puts her in his path he did something he can't forget. Now he's been in NYC waiting for her to give him a sign to rescued her from her husband. However his idea of how she has been treated by her loving husband is nothing but a misunderstanding and unfortunate situation.When fate brings this two broken souls together they will start by trying to expelled one another dirty little secret, but as they spend hours together they figured they are meant to be. Can they be happy together knowing Jeff will always have some hold on Sara?They are so many mixed feeling you will go through while reading this book. Anger, deception, sorrow, pain, are a few of the emotions you will encounter with this story.I need to find out how the end of this twisted saga between Sara, Liam and Jeff. The story will have you loving Sara one minute and disliking her the next as well as Liam, but the one that I really have a problem is Jeff. So let's see next installment how this plays out when is his turned to tell his story.Gifted by author in exchange for an honest review.https://www.facebook.com/BooksandBeyondFiftyShades

'''''' 5 STAR REVIEW ''''''Eighteen year old Emily Marcus finds herself face to face with the most gorgeous man she has ever seen. Also she knows he will never see her the way she sees him.Twenty-nine year old Louis Bruel has landed his eyes on this young beautiful girl that he wants to have. How can he get close to her so he can have her the way he wants.Fate had a different story for this two Louis being friends with Emily's brother in law, so when her sister sees how he can't keep his eyes on her she will warned her younger sister about Louis history. However when you now you have found your true love nothing will stop you from being together and that is how this two become one.Love In Rewind is a different kind of love story, first because Louis is older than Emily, but that didn't stop them from making their relationship work.The other thing is how 80's music is a big part of this dialog along Emily and her best friend Sara. If you are a fan of those song you will like this story.Third point is how being so young Emily handles herself in a very respectful matter and is nice to see how a May/Dec relationship between this two will make you fall in love with them. And lets not forget how their intimate moments are so hot and once they finally consummate their relationship it will melt your kindle.I found it lovable and liked the story. I firmly recommend this story and can't wait to see how their story continues.Gifted by author in exchange for an honest review.https://www.facebook.com/BooksandBeyondFiftyShades
